text: Hi, I’m Matt Conway, a PhD candidate in Geography at Arizona State University (and soon an assistant professor at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill). I mostly do transportation network modeling, travel behavior simulation, and econometrics.

elements.text: Hi, I’m Matt Conway, a PhD candidate in Geography at Arizona State University (and soon an assistant professor at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill). I mostly do transportation network modeling, travel behavior simulation, and econometrics.

text: Congratulations on going to Chapel Hill, great school, nice town.

elements.text: Congratulations on going to Chapel Hill, great school, nice town.

text: Wait why do geographers do econometrics? I thought everywhere outside economics people just call it statistics :joy:
